description: WNBA star Sophie Cunningham, known as the "enforcer" for the Indiana Fever, has garnered significant attention. She even surpassed Caitlin Clark in Google searches. Her career earnings, brand endorsements with Adidas and Arby's, and podcast deals contribute to her estimated $2 million net worth. Cunningham's athletic journey began with taekwondo before excelling in basketball, leading to numerous accolades.

description: India's batting stalwart Virat Kohli starred with a brilliant 131 as Delhi chased down 299 to beat Andhra by four wickets in their Vijay Hazare Trophy opener in Bengaluru. Ricky Bhui’s 122 powered Andhra to 298/8, but strong support from Priyansh Arya and Nitish Rana helped Delhi seal victory in 37.4 overs.

Masashi 'Jumbo' Ozaki: Legendary Japanese golf star dies at 78
description: Japanese golf legend Masashi “Jumbo” Ozaki has died at 78 after a battle with sigmoid colon cancer. A national icon, Ozaki won 113 tournaments worldwide and inspired a generation of golfers, becoming the first Japanese player to finish in the Masters top 10. His unparalleled career achievements remain unmatched in Japan.

5 reasons why your digestion gets worse in the winters
description: Winter's chill and shorter days quietly slow your digestion.  Cold temperatures, reduced activity, and richer foods make your gut work harder and slower.  Lower water intake and disrupted sleep further complicate things.  Understanding these seasonal shifts can help you support your digestive system through the colder months with simple adjustments.

description: India replaces the MGNREGA with the VB-G RAM G Act, shifting focus from guaranteed wage employment to rural asset creation and productivity. This reform acknowledges a transformed rural economy with robust safety nets and direct cash transfers, aiming to build capacity rather than just provide relief.

description: India's batting stalwart Rohit Sharma smashed a brilliant 155 off 94 balls as Mumbai thrashed Sikkim by eight wickets in their Vijay Hazare Trophy opener in Jaipur. The footage captured liftoff, booster separation, and satellite deployment into Low Earth Orbit, marking a significant commercial success for ISRO's heavy-lift vehicle.

title: Ashes: No Archer and Pope! England make changes to XI for 4th Test
description: England have made key changes for the Boxing Day Ashes Test against Australia. Jofra Archer is ruled out for the rest of the series with a side strain, replaced by Gus Atkinson. The court suspended Sengar's life sentence, citing he shouldn't be jailed solely on victim threat perception, while imposing strict bail conditions.

description: The Delhi High Court has urged the GST Council to hold a meeting to consider reducing the 18% GST on air purifiers due to severe air pollution. The court was hearing a plea seeking to declare air purifiers as “medical devices” and exempt them from GST, the court said air purifiers could not be treated as luxury items in a city battling extreme air pollution.

No more lottery: How new H-1B visa selection system will work — key changes explained
description: After President Donald Trump proposed a $100,000 entry fee for new H-1B visa applications, the US Department of Homeland Security announced a major overhaul of the H-1B visa selection process. The department said that the long-standing random lottery system will be replaced with a wage-weighted model that prioritises higher-paid and higher-skilled applicants.

title: Sexual act in RRTS: NCRTC suspends train operator for filming couple; FIR lodged
description: A train operator has been fired and an FIR filed against him for filming a couple's intimate act on a Namo Bharat train and sharing the video. The incident, which occurred on November 24, led to charges of obscene acts and voyeurism. Authorities are now working to trace the couple involved in the act.

title: Online fraud by ‘wealth managers’ drove ex-Punjab IG to shoot self; chilling details pour out
description: Retired Punjab IG Amar Singh Chahal attempted suicide after losing Rs 8 crore in an online fraud. Scammers posing as wealth managers lured him with fake returns, leading him to invest heavily and borrow from friends and family. An FIR has been filed against unidentified persons.

title: Tracked, shot 4 bullets: How Bengaluru techie gunned down his wife; here's what happened
description: A software professional allegedly shot his estranged wife dead on a busy Bengaluru road during rush hour following prolonged marital discord. The accused surrendered to the police with the pistol. The victim had sought legal separation, which the accused reportedly refused, leading to the fatal incident.

title: Odisha shocker: Minor girl ‘raped and murdered’; body found in jungle
description: A 10-year-old girl was found dead in a jungle in Bhadrak district. She had gone to school and did not return home. Family members found her body and filed a police complaint. Police are investigating the case as assault and murder. Angry locals blocked the highway demanding justice for the victim.

title: Nvidia may have just admitted that it cannot take Amazon, Google & Microsoft in Cloud
description: Nvidia has shelved its ambitious plan to directly challenge cloud giants like Amazon Web Services, Google Cloud, and Microsoft Azure. The chipmaker is now refocusing its DGX Cloud division inward, prioritizing its own engineers' AI model development. This strategic pivot aims to protect Nvidia's dominant AI chip market share, estimated at over 80%, rather than pursuing cloud revenue.

title: Magnesium and dementia risk: What happens to your brain when you take magnesium daily
description: New research suggests that increasing magnesium intake could significantly benefit brain health and potentially lower dementia risk. Studies indicate higher magnesium levels are linked to larger brain volume and fewer lesions, suggesting a younger-looking brain. Incorporating magnesium-rich foods like leafy greens, nuts, and seeds is recommended for optimal cognitive function as we age.

title: Paul Rudd reacts to Travis Kelce’s apology after Chiefs’ playoff exit
description: Actor Paul Rudd shared his perspective on the Kansas City Chiefs' season. He highlighted the joy and memories the team has provided his family. Rudd embraced the team's elimination from playoff contention. He wished Patrick Mahomes a speedy recovery. Rudd also humorously suggested players deserved a break after a long season. He stated he was not too upset.

title: Taylor Swift opens up about cancer scare and Travis Kelce’s support
description: Taylor Swift opened up about a painful chapter during the Eras Tour, revealing how a backup singer’s cancer diagnosis deeply shook her tour family. The experience marked an emotional low point, but Swift said she later found renewed joy and stability in her personal life, crediting Travis Kelce with bringing light and happiness after an incredibly difficult period.

title: Randi Mahomes hosts holiday giveaway as Patrick Mahomes battles injury
description: The Kansas City Chiefs are navigating a difficult season, and quarterback Patrick Mahomes is sidelined with a significant injury. Amid this challenging time, Patrick Mahomes' mother, Randi Mahomes, is focusing on a different mission which is to support families raising young athletes.

title: Shane McMahon and Marissa Mazzola’s combined net worth in 2025
description: Shane and Marissa Mazzola-McMahon possess a combined net worth of $650 million, largely attributed to Shane's decades with WWE and his diversified business ventures. While Shane's wealth stems from his executive roles, on-camera presence, and equity in WWE, Marissa's career in film production and PR augments their family fortune.

title: Salesforce reboots AI strategy: Model errors raise concerns
description: Salesforce is scaling back its reliance on large language models due to reliability issues, shifting focus to deterministic automation in its Agentforce product. Executives acknowledge a decline in trust in AI models, with reported instances of models omitting instructions and losing focus. This strategic pivot follows significant support staff reductions attributed to AI agent deployment.
